ai-patthana15.18:0.2_0: The Order of the Dhamma: allows unintelligent in the Khadehaka, that is to say, the Lord of the Death,
ai-patthana15.18:1.1_0: Some causes and reasons to give rise to the object of the past, future, or present.
ai-patthana15.18:1.1_3: The nine hundred years after examining their fruits,
ai-patthana15.18:2.1_0: (They are) not rooted in the formless realm, not with the object of the Dhamma.
